name: The Tale of White Lodge
description:
The Tale of White Lodge. Set in the house I grew up in (made using ProBuilder from Google Maps), this a short (10-15 minute) 3D first person non-sensical adventure about the imagination of a child.

All sounds from freesound.org

All assets free to use assets from Unity Assets Store.
